translations: 1. 击退，抵挡：成功地阻止敌人进攻或侵犯。
· The enemy was repulsed with heavy losses.
2. 使厌恶，使反感：引起强烈的不喜欢或不愉快的感觉。
· She was repulsed by the smell of the garbage.
她被垃圾的气味弄得恶心。

sentences.sentence: I was repulsed by the horrible smell.
sentences.translation: 这种可怕的气味让我恶心。

sentences.sentence: Each time I tried to help I was repulsed.
sentences.translation: 每次我想要帮忙都遭到了拒绝。
